content: I've been thinking about my shopping habits, and I realized that I've been swinging between luxury and budget shopping. I recently splurged on a $500 designer handbag from Gucci because I couldn't resist the sleek design and premium quality. While it was a splurge, I've been getting a lot of compliments on it, and I feel like it was worth the investment. However, I'm trying to be more mindful of my spending and find ways to save money on luxury items.
